meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a jock
meanings.sent1: His jockish attitude on the field impressed the coach.
meanings.sent2: She wore a jockish varsity jacket to the game.
meanings.sent3: The jockish high-fives after the match were a bit over the top.
meanings.sent4: His jockish determination to win was evident in every play.
meanings.sent5: The jockish energy of the team was contagious.

meanings.definition: Displaying traits associated with athletes or sports enthusiasts
meanings.sent1: The jockish camaraderie among the players was heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: Her jockish dedication to training paid off in the competition.
meanings.sent3: The jockish banter in the locker room always lightened the mood.
meanings.sent4: His jockish agility on the court was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The jockish spirit of the fans lifted the team's morale.
